text:
Pierpaolo Sileri (born 25 August 1972) is an Italian politician, surgeon and academic professor. Since 2019, he has served as the Deputy Minister of Health. He has also been a Senator since 2018. He was born in Rome.
On 14 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, it was made clear that Sileri had tested positive to COVID-19.
